record.field: This feature has not been implemented for channel %(channel)s yet.
Channel identifiers must be unique per channel.
%s (tax) of rate %f was not found.

No importable order state found.
HINT: Import order states from Order States tab in Channel.
Tax rate and name must be unique per channel
First go to user preferences and select a current_channel for "%s".
You cannot work on orders of this channel because you do not have the required permissions.
You missed some unresolved exceptions in sale %s.
There are no active listings to import images for.
At least one checkbox need to be ticked.

This wizard will export all order status or products placed on %(name)s channel(%(source)s).
Checking checkboxes below, you may choose to export products or order status or product prices or all.
* Items will be exported only for records which are updated / modified after the Last Export Time. If Last Export Time is missing, then it will export all items from beginning of time (this might be slow depending on the number of records).
At least one checkbox need to be ticked.
Data have been exported successfully to %(source)s.
Number of order status exported: %(number)s.
Number of products exported: %(number)s.
Number of product prices exported: %(number)s.
Number of inventories exported: %(number)s.

This wizard will import all orders or products placed on %(name)s channel(%(source)s).
Checking checkboxes below, you may choose to import products or orders or all.
* Items will be imported only for records which are updated / modified after the Last Import Time. If Last Import Time is missing, then it will import all items from beginning of time (this might be slow depending on the number of records).
At least one checkbox need to be ticked.
Data have been imported successfully for %(source)s.
Number of orders imported: %(number)s.
Number of products imported: %(number)s.
Number of product prices imported: %(number)s.
